materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"59d63","text":"6-well plate (Corning, #3506)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1lelk","text":"FuGene 4K Transfection Reagent (Promega, #E5911)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5sjlq","text":"Opti-MEM Reduced Serum Medium (Thermo Fisher Scientific, #31985062)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"905mh","text":"Plasmid constructs","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"odrq","text":"Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle Medium (DMEM) with GlutaMax (Thermo Fisher Scientific, #10569010)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6cjce","text":"FBS (Gibco, #26140-079)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11b5o","text":"Penicillin-streptomycin (Thermo Fisher Scientific, #15140122)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fd5vl","text":"PBS, pH 7.4 (Thermo Fisher Scientific, #10010023)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3k19e","text":"M-PER mammalian protein extraction reagent (Thermo Fisher Scientific, #78501)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"39s1h","text":"Halt Protease Inhibitor Cocktail (Thermo Fisher Scientific, #78429)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"aa21t","text":"Promega FuGENE‱ 4K Transfection Reagent (#E5911) Technical Manual: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fs40v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bhpmu","text":"https://www.promega.com/-/media/files/resources/protocols/technical-manuals/500/fugene-4k-transfection-reagent-protocol-tm694.pdf?rev=beb16dbcf2604534ace3cbe95b5080cb\u0026sc_lang=en","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":177}],"data":{}},{"key":"f4l5i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ahg1","text":"HALT Protease and Phosphatase Inhibitor:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2oaoh","text":"https://www.thermofisher.com/document-connect/document-connect.html?url=https://assets.thermofisher.com/TFS-Assets%2FLSG%2Fmanuals%2FMAN0011626_HaltProteasePhosphat_Inhibit_UG.pdf","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":179}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"F90022F612EE11EFBB390A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"F005A18512EE11EFBB390A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.promega.com/-/media/files/resources/protocols/technical-manuals/500/fugene-4k-transfection-reagent-protocol-tm694.pdf?rev=beb16dbcf2604534ace3cbe95b5080cb\u0026sc_lang=en"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"14D59C55450111EF82400A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/document-connect/document-connect.html?url=https://assets.thermofisher.com/TFS-Assets%2FLSG%2Fmanuals%2FMAN0011626_HaltProteasePhosphat_Inhibit_UG.pdf"}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9bhr3","text":"Wash each well 3 times with   ice cold 1X PBS (filtered).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fg2b0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2beg9","text":"Add M-PER with 1X protease and phosphatase inhibitor to each well (see specific protocols for volume)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":67,"length":34}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"er2f6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6fov2","text":"Be sure to keep M-PER and samples on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":41}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1l1s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ds2l0","text":"Note: HALT protease and phosphatase inhibitor must be diluted in lysis buffer immediately before use (cannot be prepared the day prior).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":46,"length":5},{"style":"italic","offset":78,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8bfvp","text":"Scrape the cells from each well 1 at a time using a cell scraper. Pipette all of the M-PER containing the cell lysate from each well into a clean 1.5 mL micro-centrifuge tube and immediately place the tubes on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9qln6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9s8cr","text":"Collect   aliquots of the supernatant and store them for future use (lysate that will be used within 1-2 weeks after harvesting can be stored at  , otherwise store lysates in  , per Cell Signaling recommendations).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":145,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":175,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":182,"length":14}],"data":{}},{"key":"5gkca","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"2E9CA6C2566E42618E547CC2C2BDD0E3","url":"https://blog.cellsignal.com/recommended-best-practices-for-lysate-handling#:~:text=Lysates%20have%20a%20shorter%20shelf,to%20repeated%20freeze%2Fthaw%20cycles."}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"el91f","text":"Incubate the plate(s) in a   incubator with 5% CO2 according to the manufacturer's protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":49,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ba2a","text":"After incubation, pipette    of the reaction mixture into the corresponding wells. Tilt the plate(s) back and forth to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4at27","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b1u5c","text":"While incubating, the DNA with FuGene:Opti-MEM,  aspirate the old media from the cells. Add   of fresh DMEM + 10% FBS + 1% pen-strep to each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":92,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3amcv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6fja3","text":"Add plasmid constructs to each tube containing FuGene:Opti-MEM (ratio according to the manufacturer's protocol  ). Vortex briefly and incubate at room temperature for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":111,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":167,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9nqn4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"900FC5792102462186F6AF8A99386CE4","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"FuGENE® 4K Transfection Reagent","rrid":"","sku":"E5911","url":"https://www.promega.com/products/luciferase-assays/transfection-reagents/fugene-4k-transfection-reagent/?catNum=E5911","vendor":{"id":23,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://www.promega.com","name":"Promega"}}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2o3i8","text":"Once cells have grown to 50-80% confluence, transfect. In a biosafety cabinet, combine FuGene and Opti-Mem (referred to in the Promega protocol as just \"medium,\" volumes according to the manufacturer's protocol  )  in a  eppendorf tube. Vortex gently for 1-2 seconds and incubate at room temperature for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":211,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":219,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":304,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1puj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"900FC5792102462186F6AF8A99386CE4","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"FuGENE® 4K Transfection Reagent","rrid":"","sku":"E5911","url":"https://www.promega.com/products/luciferase-assays/transfection-reagents/fugene-4k-transfection-reagent/?catNum=E5911","vendor":{"id":23,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://www.promega.com","name":"Promega"}}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"44cr0","text":"Seed COS-1 cells in a 6-well plate (see specific protocols for seeding density and total volume amounts). Incubate the plated cells in   with 5% CO2 (see specific protocols for duration).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":36,"length":67}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":135,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7437E0F0AA7711EE9D8F0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9sef9","text":"Cos1 cell line were purchased from (ATCC # CRL-1650) and cultured in DMEM with GlutaMax  DMEM with GlutaMax (Thermo Fisher Scientific, # 10569010)supplemented with 10% FBS Fetal Bovine Serum, certified # 16000044 and 1%  penicillin-streptomycin (Thermo Fisher Scientific, # 15140122).     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":14,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":89,"length":57},{"key":1,"offset":172,"length":40},{"key":2,"offset":221,"length":62}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"94CD94CD535F11EF92BF0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/10569010?SID=srch-srp-10569010"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"E07558B9535F11EF95730A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/10569010?SID=srch-srp-10569010"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"677BA033536011EF95730A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/15140122?SID=srch-srp-15140122"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8l5gd","text":"Cells were maintained at 37 °C in 5% CO2 and split 1:5 every 3-5 days based on the confluence (80-100 %) reached through visual monitoring. Cells were not passaged more than 30 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":39,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
